Name: Tiny Defender
About the game: Tiny Defender is a game that combines CCG and tower defense. Build your own deck and clear various stages. ■Deck Building Build a 50-card deck. You can clear the stages to get gold and acquire new cards. ■Grant Skill You can use cards to grant your tower a variety of skills such as multiple shots, bounce attacks, and slowdowns. ■Hard Mode Try clearing the stages of the difficulty.
